term.title: TICT state

item.text: The acronym derives from Twisted Internal Charge Transfer state, proposed to be responsible for strongly Stokes-shifted fluorescence from certain aromatics, particularly in a polar medium.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2280 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
